input.label: Device:
input.populatingSearch: | stats count | eval device="All devices" | eval address="*" | inputlookup append=t insteon_devices | search (subcategory=8 category=10) OR device="All devices" | lookup insteon_device_types category subcategory OUTPUT category_name description | eval device=case(address=="*", device, NOT isnull(name), name, NOT isnull(address), address, NOT isnull(device), device) | stats count(device) by device, address

input.label: Room:
input.populatingSearch: | stats count | eval room="*" | eval room_name="All rooms" | inputlookup append=t insteon_devices | eval room_name=if(isnull(room_name),room,room_name) | stats last(room_name) as room_name by room

search.query: sourcetype=insteon_plm subcategory=8 category=10 modem_command_code=50 all_link=1 `get_command_info` | stats last(command) as command last(_time) as last_seen last(subcategory) as subcategory last(category) as category by from | eval address=from | eval wet=if(like(command, "%wet%"),1,0) | inputlookup insteon_devices append=t | search subcategory=8 category=10 address="$form.device$" | stats first(wet) as wet first(last_seen) as last_seen last(name) as name last(room) as room by address | fillnull wet value="-1" | eval is_dead=case(now()-last_seen > 90000,1, isnull(last_seen), 1, 1 = 1, 0) | `timesince(last_seen,last_seen)` | fillnull last_seen value="never" | search room="$form.room$" | fields address wet name room is_dead last_seen
